---
title: "Using Rvest to Scrape Data from a Website"
author: "Kirk Nielson"
date: "June 25, 2018"
output: html_document
---


###Install & Load rvest
```{r}
library('rvest')
library('knitr')

```


###Lego movie
```{r}
lego_movie <- read_html("https://www.imdb.com/title/tt4073790/?ref_=inth_ov_tt")

lego_movie %>%
  html_node("strong span") %>%
  html_text() %>%
  as.numeric()

lego_movie %>%
  html_nodes("#titleCast .itemprop span") %>%
  html_text()

#lego_movie %>%
#  html_nodes("table") %>%
#  .[[3]] %>%
#  html_table()

```
